Definition at line 40 of file i2s_dma_test.c.

#define DMA_DST   (DMA_SRC+DMA_SIZE)

DMA Source Address is (AHBRAM1_BASE + DMA_SIZE) that used for USB RAM purpose, but it is not used in this example, so this memory section can be used for general purpose memory
